title: I Saw Mommy Kissing Santa Claus
lyrics: Christmas toys all over the place,
Little Johnny wears a funny smile upon his face; For Johnny has a secret,
And his secret he must share,
So, he tells his Teddy Bear:
I SAW MOMMY KISSING SANTA CLAUS, Underneath the mistletoe last night;
Down the stairs to have a peep,
She thought that I was tucked up
Then I saw mommy tickle Santa Claus, Underneath his beard so snowy white; Oh, what a laugh it would have been, If Daddy had only seen Mommy
